name: Window of opportunity (Sly Panda, Marienara, kasei10)
name_original: Window of opportunity (Sly Panda, Marienara, kasei10)
description:
YOU MAY NEED TO ZOOM OUT DEPENDING ON YOUR RESOLUTION   FOR THE FULL EXPERIENCE [1920x1080 Recommended]

Awaking aboard the ISS Opportunity, you take on the role of a young noble in his first posting, under the command of his father. Your ships mission is to explore strange new worlds and conquer new civilizations in the name of the Sol Empire. 

Only… This day seems very familiar, and always seems to end in disaster. You must work to save your crew and ship from a deadly enemy, and to break the loop which keeps you reliving the same day over and over.

You must either repair the FTL drive and jump to safety or defeat the evil Dni'wer and save your crew before your ship is torn apart by the anomaly.

How to play:

Control your character with WASD or the arrow keys and click through the dialog when story elements are on screen by choosing your preferred outcome.  You can also zoom out using the +/- keys or your mouses scrollwheel.

A detailed map of the ship can be viewed by holding the M key and if you need to heal, you should head to the Infirmary/Med Bay.

Some doors are locked and require a keycard to access, the story will help guide you toward the keycard which will be automatically collected as you approach it. If the story instructs you to escort someone to a location, they will follow you until you both reach the point of interest.

Depending on your path you may encounter enemies, the combat system is relatively simple and employs a rock-paper-scissors-esqe style.
